Package math

Class Vec2

  • java.lang.Object
    • math.Vec2
  • public final class Vec2
extends java.lang.Object
    2-dimensional vector operations

        public Vec2 mix​(Vec2 vec,
                float alpha)
        Linear, component-wise interpolation between the two vectors.
        Returns:
        alpha*this + (1-alpha) * vec
